resources.string: Trick or Treat is a game built by Wing Chun Siu and Lina Su. The creators of this game are students from Simon Fraser University enrolled in a computer course named cmpt 276 (Link above). Wing Chun Siu is a 22 year-old student who is pursuing a computer science degree to fulfill his dream job as a software developer. Lina Su is a 21 year-old student who is pursuing a bachelor\'s degree in computer science.

The purpose of the game is to find all the candies hidden behind the doors of the game board. The game begins with a specific number of hidden candies randomly distributed across the game board. The player is supposed to tap on the doors of the game board to find the hidden candies. An image of a candy will show if the player selects a door that contains a hidden candy. If the player selects a door that doesn\'t contain a candy, then the door will reveal a number. This number represents the total number of candies that can be found within that column and row. This number will decrease as the player finds more candies along that particular row or column. If the number is 0, it suggests that there are no candies within that row and column. Once all the hidden candies are found, the player wins the game.
